    Heatmap with logFC or z-score normalized gene expression

    wrapper_gene_expression_heatmap.Rd

    Heatmap with logFC or z-score normalized gene expression

    wrapper_gene_expression_heatmap(
  x,
  method = "z-score",
  scale = TRUE,
  title = "",
  name = NULL,
  centered = TRUE,
  palette = NULL,
  rev = FALSE,
  trim_values = NULL,
  trim_prop = NULL,
  trim_range = NULL,
  ceiling = FALSE,
  rect_gp = grid::gpar(col = NA),
  cluster_rows = FALSE,
  cluster_columns = FALSE,
  row_dend_reorder = FALSE,
  column_dend_reorder = FALSE,
  row_split = NULL,
  column_split = NULL,
  show_row_names = TRUE,
  show_column_names = FALSE,
  row_names_gp = grid::gpar(fontsize = 9),
  column_names_gp = grid::gpar(fontsize = 9),
  row_names_max_width = unit(20, "cm"),
  column_names_max_height = unit(20, "cm"),
  row_names_width = 80,
  draw = TRUE,
  return = "ht",
  ...
)

    Arguments

    x

    Matrix with expression to plot

    method

    Plot data 'asis' or transform it with 'z-score'.
